name: Ashley Woods
text: My first time to the area and my friend recommended I stop here. Was definitely worth it. Great tasting moonshine.  Lots of samples with helpful staff and even provided recommended drink Ideas and good mixers. Left with three bottles but could have bought one of everything! Definitely worth the stop.

name: Tamela Turbiville
text: We've been 2 times in 6 days. Love it ! My favorite flavor is peach , blueberry with simply lemonade and pickle! The manager is a very nice and very informative man who knows his moon shine. Highly recommend it!

name: James Wright
text: Super friendly staff and a great product. It was the first time I turned in there but it definitely won't be the last!

name: Sarah Miller
text: This was our first visit but it will not be our last!!!! This place is truly phenomenal. They have outstanding liquor with strong clean flavors.  We spent a wonderful time there with the staff educating us on their process and tasting the different varieties they sell. The banana pudding,  apple pie, and peach were our favorite moonshines!  We had a fabulous night with our friends afterwards enjoying our tasty loot! It’s doesn’t get better than this folks!

name: Paul Martinez
text: Stopped in for a tasting, walked out with a case.  This shine is EXCELLENT!  Cool t-shirts and a wide vareity of flavors.  Thanks Steven, keep up the good work!

name: Candice Moye
text: Love this place! I love the banana pudding moonshine the best. Everyone should try it.

name: Kayla Lucas
text: Courtney was such a pleasure to do business with. Quality products & service, always.

name: mike scott
text: Great place in owa.

name: Me You
text: Got me some of the banana puddin good lawd this stuff is good will be getting another bottle and some cherry bomb

name: Darci Cobb
text: These guys were very helpful and knowledgable about their products!  The Alabama Apple Pie is amazing!!

name: Anthony Headland
text: Some of the best I’ve ever had. That Praline Shine is something to be reckoned with. I strongly recommend trying a bottle.. or two!

name: Melissa P
text: Wonderful experience and very nice staff!!!

name: Lesley Hulen
text: Banana pudding moonshine is fabulous

name: M. Kelly
text: How much is a case??

name: Gregory nipper
text: Good stuff. I'm sipping on some now.

name: Plano Tex
text: Drive to Brewton, worth it!

name: Jonathan Glass
text:
Scott is one nice guy. Great vodka and very affordable hand sanitizer that's 80% alcohol.  By the gallons or less than a gallon. Right across from Atrox Factory.
Give him a call, y'all.

name: Holly Heilman
text: Jared and Scott are so fun and nice! The vodka is so smooth! Best distillery in Alabama! We drove all the way from Michigan and it’s the best vodka we’ve tried!

name: Kayla Heilman
text: Best local vodka in Alabama! Definitely worth a drive out to Leeds to get some!

name: Robert Ostellino
text: I would love to work at this distillery!

name: ExtraThicc Games
text: Best vodka around! For a small local brand, it is just as good as the expensive brands

name: Queen of Dixie
text: Very kind and inviting owner and staff! The products are 10 out of 10, Cocktails are immaculate, pricing is very fair. There are lots of neat things the owner has built out of old barrels you can purchase such as chandeliers and cigar/whisky glass holders. Absolutely love it here and will return often.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. Please share our info with your friends!

name: Anne Boynton
text: Had family in town and stopped by to sample and pick up some local whiskey. The owner was amazing and so was drinks. We purchased two bottles. Highly recommend they are very knowledgeable and care a lot about their products.

name: Summer M
text: Had the pleasure of visiting this distillery recently. The owner Gary and manager Kim are so friendly and enjoyable to talk to. I had two delicious drinks while I was there - whiskey sour and the "Sweet Roll." Both were fantastic. I also purchased a bottle of the Bourbon Whiskey for my husband. I'm not one to drink whiskey straight, but when I sampled it, even I thought it had a great flavor. Great local distillery that more people deserve to know about!

name: Kris Seeley
text: Great little distillery. Very friendly service.

name: Josh Mink
text: My wife and I stopped in on a Saturday and talked with the owner and tried samples. Had an awesome time and the owner was so kind. We purchased the Heat, Bourbon Whiskey and Rye. If your in Decatur Alabama it’s worth the stop. We will stop in again, thank you.

name: Emma Carson
text: This place is amazing! 10/10 would recommend!!

name: Katie Meyers
text: Totally worth the stop! Great people! Great tasting!!

name: James Ewing
text: Just got my first bottle and really enjoy it smooth taste with just a hint of a bite.

name: Corey Reaves
text: Outstanding spirits, highly recommend the tour with Gary. He is very knowledgeable and passionate about his craft. I will most certainly return and visit the bar next time I am in town. Do yourself a favor and drop in!

name: Jay Paustian
text: Such a great place and even better bourbon. Super clean, super friendly. Absolutely one of the best bourbons I’ve ever had. Now to try the rest of the lineup!

name: ltalna1
text: I havent had a drink of alcohol of any kind in over 17yrs. After all those years  I tasted the Heat, and I was pleased it was very smooth had the taste of Cinnamon candy. It was so good I bought a bottle. I plan to keep it locked up and will only  Break it open  in case of emergency only.

name: Michael Johnson
text: Great folks, great whiskey!  Enjoy the bourbon and the Rye, but was also surprised how good the HEAT was!  Im not a fan of Jack Daniel's fire or fireball etc and this was definitely not that.  Very enjoyable!

name: Jason Dupuis
text: A true Distillery right here in North Alabama!  The man who runs this distillery knows his craft well; the rye is absolutely top notch and I’d put it up against the best Rye whiskeys on the market.  I purchased the Rye, HEAT, and Oralé (tequila); they all impressed me and anyone who’s tried any.  My advice to anyone in the Huntsville area or anyone who visits would be to stop by the distillery and pick up a bottle of your choice.  You will not be disappointed and you will find yourself asking your local ABC of liquor store to carry Black Patch product.

name: Kyle Howard
text: Sampled everything! Great products reasonable prices friendly people 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽 go check it out

name: TR
text: The Bourbon and Rye are great! Also like the bar area.

name: Greg Mccarty
text: They are very friendly when we visited. I got a bottle of rye it was great. Can't wait to go back to get more..

name: Dena M
text: Great service!

name: Michael Bowman
text: Went to the ABC store and was asked to try the Black Patch Bourbon Whiskey. I poured a chilled shot in my Glencairn and was not happy with the aroma. The shot was not pleasant on the lips in fact had a burn to it. The taste on the palette was very off. Usually with a bourbon there's hints of the oak and carmelized notes. I don't know what they're hand made barrels are made of, but there was no hint of charred oak. Seemed to be from a stainless steel with a brown color added... I do like my bourbon with a high rye but there was only off flavor and notes. Very disappointed won't purchase this again!!!

name: Mona Tucker
text: We came there to hear band State Line Five last night !  The atmosphere and service was great and the band was fantastic. Owners were very accommodating ! We look forward to returning to future events there !

name: Matthew Zapor
text: Had a wonderful time here sampling the tons of flavors available.  The owner was excellent and showed us how the products are made.  Everything that we samples was absolutely delicious and the prices are great for locally made distilled drinks!  Can't wait to come back!

resp.text: Thanks for stopping by.  Glad you liked the product

name: Ma Th
text: This place is a hidden gem.  I got to tour the production room and the samples were amazing.  Their Coffee Moonshine and the 116 Bourbon are simply the best.  I am not a Gin drinker, but I bought a bottle of their gin.  I always try to stop here and buy a few bottles as I'm passing through.

name: Christine Ammons
text: Stumbled upon this brewery by accident.   What a great find!   Everyone was welcoming.    Samples were fantastic.   Can't wait to "stumble" thru again

resp.text: Thanks for stopping by.  Come see us again

name: Randi Wallin
text: Awesome and tasty. Drew was the best. Great atmosphere nice people!

name: Erik Egner
text:
All their products I sampled were 10/10, it was tough to decide which to purchase. Definitely recommend, you need a bottle of their stuff on your bar.

Ended up leaving with a bottle of the bourbon, apple pie moonshine and peach moonshine for the wife.

name: Not Displayed
text: Crawfish boil and good times. Was quite a blast. Well done event..

name: Pete Tyson
text: Free samples and Drew is the General Manager that explains the process of making the whiskey and shares all the new flavors

name: Cheryl Hicks
text: Alabama moonshine in several great flavors. The whiskey is smooth, and they have so many ideas for cool drinks. Very sweet people! Loved the tour. I plan on buying every flavor!

name: Celia Starling
text: Gibson's is my go to for all of their products.  Their product is excellent and has spoiled me for anything else.   Keep making the Great Hooch!

name: Maria Jernigan
text: Amazing people!  They truly care about what they are doing.  The products all taste great, and the drink ideas are endless.

name: Amy Taylor
text: So happy we stopped here! Great people and awesome Whiskey.

name: Shawn Solo
text: Smooth whiskey is just one of the products made here! I love the moonshine and gin also! A+++

name: Steve Spicer
text: They produce some outstanding Bourbon Whiskey,   I like it over Ice.    The Rye is also excellent.   You can visit them and  see where / how it is made,  have a taste and buy a bottle or  "three".

name: Jo Smyth
text: Really great to see a local distillery pop up in the area and not only that the products are really well-made.

name: Ashlee Thornton
text: Best place and most hospitable owners!

name: Dagnum PI
text: Just found out about this place. Whiskeys are good and owner is extremely nice
